content: उत्सेध {%<ab>a.</ab>%} High, tall. --धः {@--1@} A height, elevation; (<ab>fig.</ab> also); पयोधरोत्सेधविशीर्णसंहति (वल्कलं) <ls>Ku. 5. 8</ls>, <ls n="Ku. 5.">24</ls> high or projecting breasts; सोत्सेधैः स्कंधदेशैः <ls>Mu. 4. 7</ls> raised high up. {@--2@} Thickness, fatness. {@--3@} Intumescence, swelling. {@--4@} The body. {@--5@} Sublimity, greatness. --धं Killing, slaughter.
